name: Ulipity
description:
Ulipity is about solving puzzles, and dodging death as a Ulipity! Go through 15 different levels and, solve those puzzles!

Ulipity is a simple puzzle game I made, to test out my skills as a puzzle designer. The result was I made Ulipity, and got a lot more experience in Game Maker Studio. This marks my first actual finished game for release. While I think I could work on it more, to make it better, right now I wish to start a new project. Possibly there may be a new update, with more levels and mechanics, but not anytime soon.

Also if you're trying to go windowed or fullscreen use F11.
